promptTemplates.title: Marketing Campaign Ideas
promptTemplates.content: Generate three innovative marketing campaign ideas for {marketing_product_or_service}.

promptTemplates.title: Social Media Strategy
promptTemplates.content: Outline a social media strategy for {marketing_brand_name} focusing on {marketing_social_media_platforms}.

promptTemplates.title: Competitor Analysis
promptTemplates.content: Perform a competitor analysis for {marketing_company_name} in the {marketing_industry_name} industry.
